items.question: Is this YouTube Shorts Downloader completely free?
items.answer: Yes, the core download functionality is 100% free . We offer a paid subscription for premium features like 4K downloads and our AI Watermark Remover tool.

items.question: Will the YouTube watermark be preserved when I download?
items.answer: The free download retains the watermark. We offer a premium, paid AI feature specifically designed to remove watermarks for seamless cross-platform sharing. Learn more here.

items.question: Is this tool safe to use?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use secure, server-side processing methods. Your privacy is fully guaranteed, and we do not store your files or personal data.

addon.title: YTShortsDL Browser Add-On
addon.intro: To download YouTube Shorts videos even faster, simply install our official add-on. Stop copying and pasting links manually‚Äîintegrate the downloader directly into your browser.
addon.redirectNotice: You will be redirected to the official add-on installation page.
addon.howToUseDesc1: Once you install the add-on, you will see an additional icon next to your browser's address bar. This small yet powerful tool connects your browsing experience directly to our high-speed conversion servers.
addon.importantTipDesc: Please note that in some browsers (especially Chrome and Edge), new extensions are hidden by default. You may need to click the "Puzzle Piece" icon in your toolbar and pin the add-on icon to keep it permanently visible for easy access.
addon.howToUseDesc2: From then on, the process is completely automated. Every time you are watching a YouTube Shorts video that you wish to save:
addon.step1: Locate the SnapShorts icon in your toolbar.
addon.step2: Simply click on the add-on icon.
addon.step3: You will be instantly redirected to our website.
addon.step4: The video URL is automatically processed, and the video is converted to a high-quality MP4 file ready for download.
addon.instantAccessDesc: No need to copy URL, open a new tab, paste, and click convert. It happens in one click.
addon.secureSafeDesc: Our extension is reviewed by browser stores and contains no tracking code.
addon.bestQualityDesc: Automatically fetches the highest resolution available for the Short.
addon.alwaysUpdatedDesc: We maintain the add-on to ensure compatibility with the latest YouTube changes.
addon.termsNotice: As soon as the conversion is finished, you can download your converted YouTube Shorts video. By using our Add-On, you accept our
addon.troubleInstalling: Having trouble installing or using the extension?
addon.preferNoInstallationDesc: If you prefer not to install an Add-On or are on a public computer, you can try our
addon.preferNoInstallationDesc2: instead. It provides similar functionality without a permanent installation.

aiScriptGenerator.pageSubtitle: Instant insights and transcripts powered by AI.
aiScriptGenerator.secureAiProcessing: Secure AI processing using Volcano Ark Engine.
aiScriptGenerator.step1PasteUrlDesc: Copy any YouTube video or Shorts link.
aiScriptGenerator.step2AiAnalysisDesc: Our system extracts and processes the transcript.
aiScriptGenerator.step3GetSummaryDesc: Download the text or read the key highlights.
aiScriptGenerator.whyUseAiVideoSummariesDesc: Save hours of watching time. Our AI analyzes transcripts to give you key takeaways and actionable insights from any YouTube video in seconds. Perfect for students, researchers, and busy creators.
aiScriptGenerator.smartSummarizationDesc: Understand the core message without watching the whole clip.
aiScriptGenerator.multiLanguageDesc: Fetch transcripts in any language provided by the creator or auto-generated.
aiScriptGenerator.timestampedDataDesc: Navigate easily with precise time-codes for every sentence.
